verses.verse: מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> mi O יִתֶּנְךָ֙ <S%H5414><s%> yit-ten-Cha O that כְּאָ֣ח <S%H251><s%> ke-'Ach thou [wert] as my brother לִ֔י Li, יוֹנֵ֖ק <S%H3243><s%> yo-Nek that sucked שְׁדֵ֣י <S%H7699><s%> she-Dei the breasts אִמִּ֑י <S%H517><s%> 'im-Mi; of my mother אֶֽמְצָאֲךָ֤ <S%H4672><s%> 'em-tza-'a-Cha [when] I should find בַחוּץ֙ <S%H2351><s%> va-Chutz thee without אֶשָּׁ֣קְךָ֔ <S%H5401><s%> 'esh-Sha-ke-cha, I would kiss גַּ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> gam either לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- No יָב֥וּזוּ <S%H936><s%> ya-Vu-zu thee yea I should not be despised לִֽי׃ Li.

אֶנְהָֽגֲךָ֗ <S%H5090><s%> 'en-ha-ga-Cha, I would lead אֲבִֽיאֲךָ֛ <S%H935><s%> 'a-vi-'a-Cha thee [and] bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house אִמִּ֖י <S%H517><s%> 'im-Mi thee into my mother's תְּלַמְּדֵ֑נִי <S%H3925><s%> te-lam-me-De-ni; [who] would instruct אַשְׁקְךָ֙ <S%H8248><s%> 'ash-ke-Cha me I would cause thee to drink מִיַּ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> mi-Ya-yin wine הָרֶ֔קַח <S%H7544><s%> ha-Re-kach, of spiced מֵעֲסִ֖יס <S%H6071><s%> me-'a-Sis of the juice רִמֹּנִֽי׃ <S%H7416><s%> rim-mo-Ni. of my pomegranate

שְׂמֹאלוֹ֙ <S%H8040><s%> se-mo-Lo His left hand תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat be under רֹאשִׁ֔י <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi, [should be] under my head וִֽימִינ֖וֹ <S%H3225><s%> vi-mi-No and his right hand תְּחַבְּקֵֽנִי׃ <S%H2263><s%> te-chab-be-Ke-ni. should embrace

הִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> hish-Ba'-ti I charge אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not you O daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- not תָּעִ֧ירוּ׀ <S%H5782><s%> ta-'I-ru that ye stir not up וּֽמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- or תְּעֹֽרְר֛וּ <S%H5782><s%> te-'o-re-Ru nor awake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאַהֲבָ֖ה <S%H160><s%> ha-'a-ha-Vah [my] love עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad Until שֶׁתֶּחְפָּֽץ׃ <S%H2654><s%> shet-tech-Patz. until he please ס sa-Mek

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> Zot, likewise עֹלָה֙ <S%H5927><s%> 'o-Lah Who [is] this that cometh up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar, from the wilderness מִתְרַפֶּ֖קֶת <S%H7514><s%> mit-rap-Pe-ket leaning עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and דּוֹדָ֑הּ <S%H1730><s%> do-Dah; beloved תַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat Thahash הַתַּפּ֙וּחַ֙ <S%H8598><s%> hat-tap-Pu-ach thee up under the apple tree עֽוֹרַרְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H5782><s%> o-rar-Ti-cha, awakened שָׁ֚מָּה <S%H8033><s%> mah There חִבְּלַ֣תְךָ <S%H2254><s%> chib-be-Lat-cha brought thee forth אִמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H517><s%> 'im-Me-cha, there thy mother שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah There חִבְּלָ֥ה <S%H2254><s%> chib-be-Lah there she brought thee forth יְלָדַֽתְךָ׃ <S%H3205><s%> ye-la-Dat-cha. [that] bare

שִׂימֵ֨נִי <S%H7760><s%> si-Me-ni Set כַֽחוֹתָ֜ם <S%H2368><s%> cha-cho-Tam me as a seal עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over לִבֶּ֗ךָ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Be-cha, upon thine heart כַּֽחוֹתָם֙ <S%H2368><s%> ka-cho-Tam as a seal עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over זְרוֹעֶ֔ךָ <S%H2220><s%> ze-ro-'E-cha, upon thine arm כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- is as עַזָּ֤ה <S%H5794><s%> 'az-Zah [is] strong כַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> cham-Ma-vet as death אַהֲבָ֔ה <S%H160><s%> 'a-ha-Vah, for love קָשָׁ֥ה <S%H7186><s%> ka-Shah [is] cruel כִשְׁא֖וֹל <S%H7585><s%> chish-'ol as the grave קִנְאָ֑ה <S%H7068><s%> kin-'Ah; jealousy רְשָׁפֶ֕יהָ <S%H7565><s%> re-sha-Fei-ha the coals רִשְׁפֵּ֕י <S%H7565><s%> rish-Pei thereof [are] coals אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh of fire שַׁלְהֶ֥בֶתְיָֽה׃ <S%H7957><s%> shal-He-vet-Yah. [which hath a] most vehement flame

מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, Many לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יֽוּכְלוּ֙ <S%H3201><s%> yu-che-Lu cannot לְכַבּ֣וֹת <S%H3518><s%> le-chab-Bot quench אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽאַהֲבָ֔ה <S%H160><s%> ha-'a-ha-Vah, love וּנְהָר֖וֹת <S%H5104><s%> u-ne-ha-Rot neither can the floods לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יִשְׁטְפ֑וּהָ <S%H7857><s%> yish-te-Fu-ha; drown אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten would give אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish it if [a] man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all ה֤וֹן <S%H1952><s%> Hon all the substance בֵּיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To of his house בָּאַהֲבָ֔ה <S%H160><s%> ba-'a-ha-Vah, for love בּ֖וֹז <S%H936><s%> Boz it would utterly יָב֥וּזוּ <S%H936><s%> ya-Vu-zu be contemned לֽוֹ׃ lo. ס sa-Mek

אָח֥וֹת <S%H269><s%> a-Chot sister לָ֙נוּ֙ la-nu קְטַנָּ֔ה <S%H6996><s%> ke-tan-Nah, We have a little וְשָׁדַ֖יִם <S%H7699><s%> ve-sha-Da-yim and she hath no breasts אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein has לָ֑הּ Lah; מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What נַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh what shall we do לַאֲחֹתֵ֔נוּ <S%H269><s%> la-'a-cho-Te-nu, for our sister בַּיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom in the day שֶׁיְּדֻבַּר־ <S%H1696><s%> shei-ye-dub-bar- when she shall be spoken for בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If חוֹמָ֣ה <S%H2346><s%> cho-Mah If she [be] a wall הִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> Hi, We נִבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> niv-Neh we will build עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha on טִ֣ירַת <S%H2918><s%> Ti-rat upon her a palace כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef; of silver וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if דֶּ֣לֶת <S%H1817><s%> De-let and if she [be] a door הִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> Hi, We נָצ֥וּר <S%H6696><s%> na-Tzur we will inclose עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha her with ל֥וּחַ <S%H3871><s%> Lu-ach her with boards אָֽרֶז׃ <S%H730><s%> 'A-rez. of cedar

אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I חוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> cho-Mah, I [am] a wall וְשָׁדַ֖י <S%H7699><s%> ve-sha-Dai and my breasts כַּמִּגְדָּל֑וֹת <S%H4026><s%> kam-mig-da-Lot; like towers אָ֛ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then הָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti became בְעֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nav then was I in his eyes כְּמוֹצְאֵ֥ת <S%H4672><s%> ke-motz-'Et as one that found שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom. favour פ Peh

כֶּ֣רֶם <S%H3754><s%> Ke-rem had a vineyard הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah had לִשְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> lish-lo-Moh Solomon בְּבַ֣עַל be-Va-'al הָמ֔וֹן <S%H1174><s%> ha-Mon, at Baalhamon נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan he let out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּ֖רֶם <S%H3754><s%> hak-Ke-rem the vineyard לַנֹּטְרִ֑ים <S%H5201><s%> lan-no-te-Rim; unto keepers אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one יָבִ֥א <S%H935><s%> ya-Vi thereof was to bring בְּפִרְי֖וֹ <S%H6529><s%> be-fir-Yo for the fruit אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef a thousand כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. [pieces] of silver

כַּרְמִ֥י <S%H3754><s%> kar-Mi My vineyard שֶׁלִּ֖י shel-Li לְפָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai; which [is] mine [is] before הָאֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> ha-'E-lef [must have] a thousand לְךָ֙ le-Cha שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh, me thou O Solomon וּמָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> u-ma-Ta-yim thereof two hundred לְנֹטְרִ֥ים <S%H5201><s%> le-no-te-Rim and those that keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פִּרְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H6529><s%> pir-Yo. the fruit

בְּרַ֣ח׀ <S%H1272><s%> be-Rach Make haste דּוֹדִ֗י <S%H1730><s%> do-Di, my beloved וּֽדְמֵה־ <S%H1819><s%> u-de-meh- and be thou like לְךָ֤ le-Cha לִצְבִי֙ <S%H6643><s%> litz-Vi to a roe א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or לְעֹ֣פֶר <S%H6082><s%> le-'O-fer or to a young הָֽאַיָּלִ֔ים <S%H354><s%> ha-'ai-ya-Lim, hart עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei upon the mountains בְשָׂמִֽים׃ <S%H1314><s%> ve-sa-Mim. of spices
